quizzes.title: Data Analysis Basics Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your understanding of fundamental data analysis concepts and statistical methods.

questionData.question: What is the first step in any data analysis project?
questionData.explanation: Understanding and collecting quality data is the foundation of any successful data analysis project.

quizzes.title: Statistical Analysis Quiz
quizzes.description: Evaluate your knowledge of statistical methods and hypothesis testing in data science.

questionData.question: What does a p-value represent in hypothesis testing?
options: The probability of the null hypothesis being true
The probability of observing the data given the null hypothesis is true
questionData.explanation: A p-value represents the probability of observing the data (or more extreme) given that the null hypothesis is true.

quizzes.title: Data Visualization Quiz
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge of effective data visualization techniques and best practices.

questionData.question: Which chart type is best for showing the relationship between two continuous variables?
questionData.explanation: Scatter plots are ideal for showing relationships between two continuous variables and identifying correlations.
